info.title: VIRL/CML 2.0 API
info.description: API definition for the VIRL/CML network simulation platform.

license.name: Copyright (c) 2020 Cisco Systems, Inc. and/or its affiliates

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication API endpoints to acquire an Authentication token. The token must be conveyed as a HTTP header. The name of the header is `Authentication` and the content is `Bearer token-goes-here`

tags.name: Labs
tags.description: Web services for the labs themselves, including creating new labs and getting the list of all labs.

tags.name: Nodes
tags.description: Web services for the nodes in a lab.  Each node represents a deviced in the topology, such as a router, switch, firewall, or host.

tags.name: Interfaces
tags.description: Web services for the interfaces of nodes in a lab.

tags.name: Links
tags.description: Web services for the links or connections between nodes in the lab.  Links will generally connect at each end to exactly one interface.

tags.name: Configurations
tags.description: Web services for the device configurations associated with the nodes in a lab.  Note that these configurations are generally not the running configuration on a running simulation.  They are the configurations applied to a (wiped) node when it is started with no previous state.

tags.name: Runtime
tags.description: Web services for working with items that are only exposed by the simulation at runtime, such as console connections and packet captures.

tags.name: System
tags.description: Web services for the underlying VIRL^2 software and the system where it runs.

tags.name: Node Definitions
tags.description: Node Definitions define the properties of a virtual network node. They are paired with image definitions to define a complete virtual network node.

tags.name: Metadata
tags.description: Web services that work with the metadata about the topology, such as node type definitions and the state of various objects in the virtual labs.

tags.name: Image Definitions
tags.description: Web services that work with images that are required to boot a virtual network node.

servers.description: This is version zero of the API

post.summary: Authenticate to the system, get a web token

200.description: The response body is a JSON web token

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

get.summary: Get roles for this user

200.description: The response body is a JSON list of the roles the user has

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

get.summary: Get the list of available users

200.description: The response body is a list of user information objects.

put.summary: User password change.
put.description: Allows a user to change their password. Both old and new password are required. A user with administrative privileges can set a new password by providing an arbitrary or empty old password.

200.description: Nothing

get.summary: Gets user info

200.description: A user definition
Nothing
Nothing

200.description: The response body is a JSON object of current user-facing licensing configuration and status

204.description: The agent has scheduled an authorization renewal

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

200.description: The transport configuration has been accepted

400.description: Invalid input. The response body is a JSON object of the error

200.description: The certificate was accepted by the agent

400.description: The certificate was rejected by the agent

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

200.description: The certificate was removed if it existed

400.description: The removal was rejected by the agent

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

token.description: A token generated by the target SSMS instance to authorize product to it

reregister.description: Request reregistration from the current SSMS

204.description: The (re)registration request was accepted by the agent

400.description: Invalid input. The response body is a JSON object of the error

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

409.description: (Re)registration cannot be requested at this time. The response body is a JSON object of the error

put.summary: Request a renewal of licensing registration against current SSMS

204.description: The renewal request was accepted by the agent

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

409.description: Registration renewal cannot be requested at this time. The response body is a JSON object of the error

delete.summary: Request deregistration from the current SSMS

202.description: Deregistration has been completed on the Product Instance but was unable to deregister from Smart Software Licensing due to a communication timeout.

204.description: The Product Instance was successfully deregistered from Smart Software Licensing.

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

409.description: Deregistration cannot be requested at this time. The response body is a JSON object of the error

get.summary: Get current licensing features

200.description: The response body is a list of current licensing features

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

200.description: The response body is a JSON object of features with updated count of license

id2.description: Updated count of licenses for this feature

403.description: Access is denied. The response body is a JSON object of the error

put.summary: Enable or disable reservation mode in unregistered agent.

200.description: The reservation mode has been enabled or disabled.

409.description: License reservation is already enabled. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

post.summary: Initiate reservation by generating request code and message to the user.

200.description: The reservation request code that must be entered into the CSSM.

409.description: Agent is already registered or reservation mode not enabled. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

post.summary: Complete reservation by installing authorization code from CSSM.

200.description: The confirmation code of the completed reservation

400.description: Invalid input parameters or could not validate the key. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

409.description: No license reservation is in progress or authorization code does not match the request code. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

delete.summary: Cancel reservation request without completing it.

204.description: The reservation request has been cancelled.

409.description: No license reservation is in progress. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

200.description: The return code of the released reservation

400.description: Invalid input parameters. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

409.description: No authorization code instaled in device. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

delete.summary: Discard a reservation authorization code for an already cancelled reservation request.

200.description: The discard code for an already cancelled reservation request.

400.description: Invalid or missing input parameters. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

409.description: Agent or reservation is not enabled, or reservation request is in progress or authorization code found in TS. The response body is a JSON object of the error.

get.summary: Get the confirmation code

200.description: The confirmation code of the completed reservation or null

204.description: The confirmation code has been removed

400.description: The confirmation code is not defined

get.summary: Get the return code

200.description: The return code of the released reservation or null

204.description: The return code has been removed

400.description: The return code is not defined

ImportLabResponse.description: Successful lab import.  The response has the lab ID and potential warnings as text / Markdown.

IdResponse.description: Successful POST / Create operation.  The response body is a JSON object that indicates the ID of the created object.

ElementStateResponse.description: JSON object with the state of all nodes, interfaces, and links in the lab.

WebSocketStatusResponse.description: (**Placeholder**)  Expect the fields and values to change in the future.

RESTNode.description: Special exchange format for the node details in JSON format.

label.description: A label for the specified node

node_definition.description: Node Definition ID for the specified node

image_definition.description: Image Definition ID for the specified node

state.description: The status of the node in the lab.

configuration.description: The initial bootstrap configuration for the node.

RESTLink.description: Special exchange format for the link details in JSON format.

state.description: The status of the link in the lab.

RESTInterface.description: Special exchange format for the interface details in JSON format.

state.description: The status of the interface in the lab.

RESTTopology.description: A JSON object that describes topology, including its nodes, interfaces, links, and details, such as the user-supplied title and notes.

LabDetail.description: Metadata about the state of the lab itself

id.description: Internal, unique ID for the lab.

created.description: The date and time when the lab was created.

lab_title.description: A short, user-specified title for the lab.

lab_description.description: An optional description for the lab.

node_count.description: Number of nodes (or devices) in the lab.

link_count.description: Number of connections between nodes in the lab.

LabState.description: The overall state of the lab.

id.description: A symbolic name used to identify this node definitions, such as `iosv` or `asav`.

data.description: TODO define the schema of the underlying 'data'

id.description: A symbolic name used to identify this Image Definition

node_definition_id.description: Node Definition ID for the Image Definition

description.description: An optional description for the Image Definition

label.description: A required label for the Image Definition

disk_image.description: A source image for the Image Definition

read_only.description: Whether the Image Definition can be updated or deleted

disk_subfolder.description: A sub-folder where the Image Definition is stored

ClusterNodeInformation.description: The system information for a particular cluster compute node.

SystemStats.description: The system information for this back end.  The basic structure is a nested dictionary from (cluster name to (a dictionary from compute node names in that cluster to information about those compute nodes)).

PasswordChange.description: Data required for a password change. Both are required.

CreateUser.description: Information needed to create a new user.

password.description: the cleartext password for this user

fullname.description: the full name of the user

description.description: additional, textual free-form detail of the user
description.example: Rules the network simulation world, location: unknown

roles.description: User roles. Case insensitive User or Admin. When empty or not present, assumes User

fullname.description: the full name of the user

description.description: additional, textual free-form detail of the user
description.example: Rules the network simulation world, location: unknown

created.description: the create date of the user, a string in ISO8601 format

modified.description: last modification date of the user, a string in ISO8601 format

LicensingStatus.description: Configuration and status of Smart Licensing

status.description: The current registration status of this product instance

smart_account.description: Name of the customer Smart Account associated with registration

virtual_account.description: Name of the virtual sub-account associated with registration

instance_name.description: Name of this product instance within SSM associated with registration

expires.description: The time current valid registration is due to expire

status.description: The current authorization status of this product instance

expires.description: The time current valid authorization is due to expire

default_ssms.description: The main production URL which shall be set unless changed by user

min.description: Current authorization status for this individual feature

max.description: Current authorization status for this individual feature

in_use.description: Currently requested count of uses for this feature

status.description: Current authorization status for this individual feature

id.description: Requested count of licenses for this feature

LicensingTimeInfo.description: Timing information on communication with SSMS

succeeded.description: The time when the given request last completed with success

attempted.description: The time when the given request was last made

scheduled.description: The time when the given request will be made next without intervention

status.description: The status result of the last attempt

failure.description: The failure reason of the last attempt

success.description: The status of the last communication attempt

server.description: Domain name of the HTTP proxy server

port.description: Port of the HTTP proxy server

LicensingPublicCertification.description: Contents of the public certificate in PEM format

LicensingReservationRequestCode.description: Reservation request code for the CSSM

LicensingAuthorizationCode.description: Authorization request code from the CSSM

LicensingConfirmationCode.description: The confirmation code from a completed reservation

LicensingReturnCode.description: The return code from a released reservation

LicensingDiscardCode.description: The discard code for an already cancelled reservation

code.description: The HTTP status that was associated with this error.

description.description: A human-readable message that describes the error.

id.description: the lab ID of the imported lab

UserIdPathParameter.name: user_id
UserIdPathParameter.description: The unique ID of a username on this controller.

LabIdPathParameter.name: lab_id
LabIdPathParameter.description: The unique ID of a lab on this controller.

NodeIdPathParameter.name: node_id
NodeIdPathParameter.description: The unique ID of a node within a particular lab.

InterfaceIdPathParameter.name: interface_id
InterfaceIdPathParameter.description: The unique ID of an interface within a particular lab.

LinkIdPathParameter.name: link_id
LinkIdPathParameter.description: The unique ID of a link within a particular lab.

OriginUuidQueryParameter.name: origin_uuid
OriginUuidQueryParameter.description: The optional UUID of the sender

AuthDataBody.description: This request body is a JSON object that holds authentication data.

VIRL1.xImportBody.description: This request body is a VIRL v1.x topology in the XML format defined by the virl.xsd schema.

VIRLv2ImportBody.description: This request body is a JSON object that defines a VIRL^2 topology.

RESTTopologyBody.description: This request body is a JSON object that describes a single topology.

CoreNodeBody.description: A JSON object with a node's fundamental properties.

InterfaceRequestBody.description: A JSON object that specifies a request to create an interface on a node.  If the slot is omitted, the request indicates the *first* unused slot on the node.  If the slot is specified, the request indicates *all unallocated* slots up to and including that slot.
